overview: JB INFRA bring to you one of the biggest and prestigious project named JB's NATURE VALLEY Which is a large scale multifunctional eco-friendly 700 acre development in Choutuppal, Hyderabad.The project is to create a flexible urban strategies that build a scope for the community to evolve over time and the open layout township was intended to maintain the balance of social equity, physical & mental well being and to maintain ecology. To connect people and nature with pollution free zone with environmental friendly design. .Whole purpose of the project is to serve the future generation with less polluted zone and to improve our quality of life. New era of ideology and techniques with all indoor and outdoor amenities to survive a healthy and functional life style.
valuesproject: State of the art club house with swimming pool
Clear title and Layout as per 100% vasthu.
Overhead water tank with water supply lines.
Walking Track with Kerb Stones and Avenue Plantation on 100' Road.
Rain water drain through well connected Harvesting Pits.
Land Scape Gardens in parks and open spaces.
Provision of Cycling Track on 100' Road
Parks with Fruit Bearing & Medicinal Tree & Plants
valueslocation: ON DIRECT CAPITAL TO CAPITAL ROAD WITH FUTURE PLAN OF HIGHSPEED TRAIN.
NEAR TO PROPOSED REGIONAL RING ROAD.
CLOSER TO PHARMACEUTICALS & LABORATORIES - LIKE SRINI, DIVIS, NOSCH.
